amendatorysection.catchline: Administration of anesthesia, sedation, or analgesia; permit required; exception.
amendatorysection.para: A dentist licensed in this state shall not administer general anesthesia, parenteral sedation, or inhalation analgesia in the practice of dentistry unless he or she has been issued a permit to administer general anesthesia, parenteral sedation, or inhalation analgesia pursuant to the Dentistry Practice Act.
